name: int_posting_entry__op
description: This table records the details of financial transactions and postings for clients, including timestamps, account information, and transaction specifics.

columns.name: value_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction value is recorded.

columns.name: insertion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction entry is inserted into the database.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: cif
columns.description: Customer Information File number, a unique identifier for the client's account profile.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the client's account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: internal_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the internal account used in the transaction.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: Code representing the general ledger account associated with the transaction.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Address associated with the account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: phase
columns.description: The phase or stage of the transaction process.

columns.name: credit
columns.description: Boolean indicating whether the transaction is a credit.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount involved in the transaction.

columns.name: balance_amount
columns.description: The balance amount in the account after the transaction.

columns.name: currency
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction is denominated.

columns.name: banking_product
columns.description: The banking product associated with the transaction.

columns.name: trans_type_name
columns.description: The name of the transaction type.

columns.name: transaction_code_domain
columns.description: Domain classification of the transaction code.

columns.name: transaction_code_family
columns.description: Family classification of the transaction code.

columns.name: transaction_code_subfamily
columns.description: Subfamily classification of the transaction code.

columns.name: sbv_code
columns.description: Code representing the SBV (State Bank of Vietnam) classification.

columns.name: batch_id
columns.description: Identifier for the batch in which the transaction is processed.

columns.name: instructions_id
columns.description: Identifier for the instructions associated with the transaction.

columns.name: request_id
columns.description: Identifier for the request that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: posting_id
columns.description: Identifier for the posting entry of the transaction.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the transaction.

columns.name: error_type
columns.description: Type of error encountered during the transaction process.

columns.name: error_message
columns.description: Message describing the error encountered.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the data lake house entry was created.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: batch_details
columns.description: Details and metadata about the batch processing.

columns.name: instruction_details
columns.description: Details and metadata about the instructions associated with the transaction.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source system from which the data lake house entry originated.

columns.name: amount_sign
columns.description: Indicates the sign of the transaction amount, typically positive or negative.
